channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Best Moments
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Frank - We're happy to hear you're loving your Kuri! :D
item.content:encoded: Hi Frank – We’re happy to hear you’re loving your Kuri! 😀

item.title: By: paul dimino
item.dc:creator: paul dimino
item.description: hey frank can you tell us about your kuri,has it lived up to expectations?some of us have to wait till spring to get ours,thanks
item.content:encoded: hey frank can you tell us about your kuri,has it lived up to expectations?some of us have to wait till spring to get ours,thanks

item.title: By: Frank Leisten
item.dc:creator: Frank Leisten
item.description: Kuri is just amazing. Received for Christmas 2017. Great Product. Highly recommend for the household.
item.content:encoded: Kuri is just amazing. Received for Christmas 2017. Great Product. Highly recommend for the household.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Jack - That's awesome! Welcome to the Kuri family. :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Jack – That’s awesome! Welcome to the Kuri family. 🙂

item.title: By: Jack Thompson
item.dc:creator: Jack Thompson
item.description: I was given the Kuri as a Christmas present!! Can't wait to receive my new robot!!
item.content:encoded: I was given the Kuri as a Christmas present!! Can’t wait to receive my new robot!!
